title: Input schema of the Substack Newsletter Directory scraper

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: Seed URLs to start crawling from (Substack discover pages, tag pages, or specific newsletter pages).

maxRequestsPerCrawl.title: Max Requests per Crawl
maxRequestsPerCrawl.description: Maximum number of requests the crawler will perform.

useBrowser.title: Use Playwright (for client-side pages)
useBrowser.description: If true, use a browser crawler to render JS-heavy Substack pages.

followInternalOnly.title: Follow internal links only
followInternalOnly.description: If true, only follow links within the same host as each start URL.
